property.name: type
property.label: Type
property.description: Type of call out with a choice of default and calendar-event.

property.name: heading
property.label: Heading
property.description: Overview of the callout if required.

property.name: level
property.label: Heading level
property.description: Level of heading to be used.

property.name: headingSrOnly
property.label: Heading for Screen-readers only
property.description: Keep the heading for screen-readers only.

property.name: content
property.label: Content
property.default: Callouts are text excerpts, used as a *visual* cue to draw attention to the text. They're used to help direct users toward an **important** piece of information or a required action. Leave empty to get a slot in LWR.

property.name: className
property.label: Class name
property.description: Additional CSS class to be applied.
